author: Giorgio Mendoza
description: M5Stack has announced the Cardputer-Adv, a new entry in its compact Cardputer lineup that builds on the Cardputer v1.1. The updated version retains the same card-sized design while adding a larger battery, improved audio system, and motion sensing capabilities. It is powered by the Stamp-S3A core module based on the ESP32-S3FN8 dual-core Xtensa LX7 processor, […]
title: M5Stack Introduces Cardputer-Adv with Expanded Features and Higher-Capacity Battery

author: Giorgio Mendoza
description: A new add-on board for the Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W called the AV-USB has been introduced as an all-in-one expansion solution. It eliminates the need for separate USB hubs or sound cards by integrating multiple interfaces onto a single compact board. The AV-USB provides three full-size USB-A ports via an onboard hub, along with […]
title: Pi Zero 2 W AV-USB board adds USB hub, audio, and video output
